citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:36 am on
07/25/2016. Front gate was closed and locked. Inspector attempted to contact licensee by phone and messages
left. Inspector departed the facility at 12:08 pm.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:36 am on
07/25/2016.  Front gate was closed and locked.  Inspector attempted to contact licensee by phone and messages
left.  Inspector departed the facility at 12:08 pm.
